dialogue.name: OFPILONA
dialogue.text: Oho! You must be Forename. Mistress Rowena's told me all about you. Says you're quite the renowned [Job]!

dialogue.name: OFPILONA
dialogue.text: The name's Ofpilona, by the way. The mistress's charged me with managing her Radz–at–Han branch. Lookin' forward to doin' business with you!

dialogue.name: OFPILONA
dialogue.text: ...Which isn't to say I've got anythin' special to ask of you. All I mean is that your business is just as welcome here as it is at any other House of Splendors.

dialogue.name: OFPILONA
dialogue.text: O' course, I'd certainly prefer you do more of your business here than anywhere else. Esteemed clients like yourself'll attract even more customers, y'see.

dialogue.name: OFPILONA
dialogue.text: And if we keep drawin' in business at a good clip, before long we'll have to rebrand as Ofpilona's House of Splendors... That old witch won't know what hit 'er...

dialogue.name: OFPILONA
dialogue.text: ...Er, don't you worry about that last part. Just peruse our wares and buy somethin' if it strikes your fancy!

dialogue.name: OFPILONA
dialogue.text: <sigh> What I wouldn't give to find an expert artisan...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 80 or above.
